page.title: 02Employment in Durris
page.content: The jobs in our block are mainly to do with the land.The most popular job is probably farming,followed by forestry.Farming takes all the better land,and the rough land is used for tree planting.If the land is too marshy for trees it is left as it is.There are six people in our class whose dads are farmers.Other people in the area work as gamekeepers, woodcutters,lorry drivers and teachers.A lot of people have to travel to go to work.Some work in the nearby town of Banchory,six miles away.They work in shops and offices there.Most,however,travel into Aberdeen,about thirteen miles away,and many of them work in oil related business, which has become very important in the last ten years.Very few people are unemployed here.
